EmailTemplate.name: Be One With Vin Prize Giveaway!
EmailTemplate.subject: Be One with VIN Prize Giveaway!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Be One with VIN has its benefits. Up to $150K in benefits!
Go to www.VinToWin.com and register now. That's the first step.
How else can you Be One with VIN and WIN up to $150K in prizes? Let's count the ways...
1. Stop by booth #4574N at NADA or register at www.VinToWin.com to get a be One with Vin wristband (make sure you wear it at NADA) 2. Follow us on Twitter (www.twitter.com/vinsolutions) @VinSolutions and watch the hashtag #beOnewithVin 3. Post "Be One With Vin" on our Facebook Fan Page (www.facebook.com/vinsolutions) 4. For existing VinSolutions customers make sure you have a profile at http://community.vinsolutions.com/ for special announcements and prizes!
All of the above come with their own exclusive ways to WIN, so don't just stop at one...increase your odds and ENTER ALL 4 WAYS!
You do not have to be a customer to win. But if you are a customer, be sure to join the VinCommunity for special prizes and announcements you will only get here: http://community.vinsolutions.com/. YOU MUST BE A MEMBER of the VinCommunity to be eligible for the VinPackage that includes an entire year of Vin Solutions for one rooftop FREE.
PRIZES INCLUDE: 55" Flat Screen TVs, iPads, MacBooks, giftcards and more. One dealer (maybe you!) may win a VinPackage that includes a suite of FREE Vin products and services for an entire year!
Good Luck. Have Fun. And Be One with VIN! One Solution. One Integration. One Collaboration. Be One with VIN.
